REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2033 reute r f BC-<TOPPS-CO-INC>-FILES 04-01 0104

TEXT.TITLE: <TOPPS CO INC> FILES FOR INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Topps Co Inc said it has filed for an initial public offering of 4,500,000 common shares, including 3,500,000 shares to be sold by shareholders. It said lead underwriters are <Goldman, Sachs and Co> and Alex. Brown and Sons Inc <ABSB> and the underwriting group has been granted an option to buy up to 675,000 more shares to cover overallotments. The initial offering price is expected to be 15 to 18 dlrs a share, and proceeds will be used for debt reduction, it said. Topps had been public once before but went private in a leveraged buyout in 1984. Reuter
